item.description:
• Added new experimental performance optimization code. Should improve prediction performance but might cause prediction (and other) errors. Let me know!
  • Free Cancel is now enabled by default (with option to turn this off.)
  • Uncapped FPS (does not affect gameplay logic)
  • Adjusted UI during move selection to allow for more space …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.description:
• Fixed character info containers (cowboy's cylinder, wiz gravity, etc) moving around on the screen based on the matchup (this will hopefully fix some problems with mods). They're also slightly more compact.

All Characters

  • Jump

    • Has immediate throw invulnerability when jumping forward now.

    • Push Block

    • Increased push trigger distance (80px -> 110px …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.description:
• Emergency adjustments
  • I didn't want to make any more changes before Olympus, but many of the top players (of all characters, including Wiz) have alerted me of a massively overpowered strategy that allows for Wizard to win while taking no risks. This was demonstrated at today's Protocol tournament where 6 …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.description:
• Just a quick bugfix and small balance update to tackle some of the bigger more obvious problems.
  • Possibly fixed landing-related prediction errors. This might cause some changes to landing IASA.

All Characters

  • Fixed Block not working after Pushblock.
  • Sadness gain is reduced for the player with less health, proportional to …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.description:
All Characters

  • Push Block
    • Push Block after normal block works against projectiles now.

Wizard

  • Missile Form
    • Orb Dart trigger Delayed by 3 frames (18f -> 21f)

Cowboy

  • Foresight

    • Fixed exploit allowing for illegal angles.

    • Teleport

    • Fixed exploit allowing for illegal angles.

    • Temporal Round

    • Is now immune to other projectiles and melee …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.description:
• UI now explicitly tells you when you are in a combo vs when you are in neutral.
  • Added UI info for current initiative state and which actions can use Initiative.
  • Added a sound that plays when your time is running out.
  • Hit particles should show up in the right place …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.description:
• Lobbies no longer default to custom characters being enabled. This is to promote a similar balance of modded to vanilla lobbies to before character loader was merged into base game, as modded lobbies have become a dominant majority and vanilla players are finding it difficult to find games.
    • You can …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.description:
• Lobbies now wait for characters to load, this should fix the "mod mismatch" issue
  • Adjusted sound effect for all level-1 supers (think of them like EX moves...)

  • Added some global freeze frames on hit/block. Shouldn't affect gameplay at all. The goal is to make full-speed replays a little more …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly
